website_summaries.verdict: This durable ripstop polyester double hammock dries more quickly than nylon designs. And it boasts an attached stuff sack that's big enough to hold an e-reader.
pros: Heavy duty double hammock made from ripstop polyester
Easy for two users to enter and exit
Comes with attached lightweight aluminum carabiners
Convenient storage pouch large enough to hold a tablet
cons: Some individuals received a different model, which was less well made
Be sure to check your packaging upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: A Leaf Hide-away in the Trees!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter brought this hammock to my attention when she blithely packed hers to bring home for a visit -- such a tiny footprint! I put mine up when two young city visitors come around, and they squeal with delight at this unusual outdoor comfort place. They pretend they are inside a leaf, and so they are! Thank you for creating this exquisite hideaway of peace for all who come to my home. It's very strong and hardy, and I can't wait to order the black straps that are designed for it. We're using river boat straps presently, but the black straps would be kinder to the oak and maple trees.
customer_reviews.author: Motherlode

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong hammock
customer_reviews.text: So my hammock is great, have been using on our terrace but like other review it is NOT the slacker hammock it’s the solo hammock which I hear is not supposed to be as quality of an item. It also did not have the pattern on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: NYShopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Not a Therm-a-Rest Slacker
customer_reviews.text: Seller has mislabeled the lesser cost items as the Slacker. These are a lesser grade product. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas CoffeyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: They do not ship the same hammocks as the ones in the photos!
customer_reviews.text: I have and absolutely love my Slacker Hammock. But when I tried to order more from this site (as gifts) they have twice sent the Solo Hammock, which is not the same. The first time I thought maybe I just mis-ordered by accident, but the second time I took a screen shot at the time I placed the order and what arrived is not the product in the picture. The material is not the same, the case is not the same. Make sure you get a true Slacker Hammock because those are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Came with steel carabiners instead of aluminum.
customer_reviews.text: The hammock itself is great! But it came with heavy steel carabiners instead of aluminum. So much for light weight tent alternative. Send me the right product and i would give it a 5
customer_reviews.author: Bradley c

customer_reviews.title: I love this hammock and bought one for everyone in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this hammock and bought one for everyone in my family for a total of 4. One of the straps had a defect, but the seller quickly sent a replacement. The hammock is durable, breaths easy and is compact. I often take one when I ride my motorcycle and want to take a break. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: Ripped 2 years later
customer_reviews.text: I have used this hammock for two years now and has had great BUT it just ripped today when my boyfriend and I were laying in it and we both dropped to the ground. Just be cautious on the height level you put this hammock up at. I’m 140 lbs and he is 200 lbs so that could be a weight limit thing idk but we’re not fat and it’s a double person hammock so it should have easily held us..
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: But maybe someday I won't be #ForeverAlone and it'll fit better lol. Good quality though
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have gotten the single since it's just me and my dog - you kind of drown in the extra 2 person fabric! But maybe someday I won't be #ForeverAlone and it'll fit better lol. Good quality though, I believe it won't rip even after I eat lots of BBQ haha
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hammock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my globe-trotting daughter and her boyfriend and it was a big hit. DON'T FORGET TO BUY THE HANGING APPARATUS ! I cut an article out of the paper last year which gave the top ten gifts to give to travelers and this was number one. It is very lightweight and easily packable.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Silver

customer_reviews.title: Great color and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great color and great price. Fits me and my husband (~350 lbs) and then some. EAsy to instal with straps.
customer_reviews.author: HANNAH

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This hammock packs up small, is easy to set up, and is very comfortable. I was surprised the first time I sat down in it — the fabric is a bit stretchy. Overall I give it 4 stars, because I generally don't rate things 5 stars unless it's a truly exceptional product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the material
customer_reviews.text: I love the material, it feels great to lie in! I've had a handful of single-camping hammocks and this one is really durable. The carabiners are high quality, and the stuff sack design is great for quick stuffing (and holding books and flashlights and snacks!). Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L. Musclow

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughter after reading lots of reviews and it hasn't disappointed. The polyester fabric is indeed very comfortable with less stretch than my nylon hammock from a well known brand. It doesn't pack down quite as small as the nylon counterpart but the weight is comparable. It also looks great hanging in her bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Hann007

customer_reviews.title: win!
customer_reviews.text: love it. fits me and my lab perfectly. strong material, withstands the wear of dog nails and wiggling. very comfortable. great color
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Really love it. Super comfortable, I can fit me and two kids and a dog inside, or I can hold up half behind my back and use it as almost a seat. Just the best hammock.
customer_reviews.author: J & D

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock, material feels wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to get a diagonal lay for sleeping while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O

customer_reviews.title: Check your order.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a thermarest slacker hammock and received a thermarest solo hammock (much cheaper quality) I am returning for a replacement with, hopefully, the correct listed product. If it happens again I will just return and source the correct hammock from REI.
customer_reviews.author: Pk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammock - cool, weighs almost nothing, looking forward to lots of use!
customer_reviews.author: J. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to take to camp. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: ... of the cloth really does differentiate this from competitors like eno. (eno makes a pretty sweet hammock too)
customer_reviews.text: the feel of the cloth really does differentiate this from competitors like eno. (eno makes a pretty sweet hammock too)
customer_reviews.author: Slin

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock that handles the elements well.
customer_reviews.text: After going through 3 different rope-style hammocks in the past 2 years I decided to try something different in the Therm-a-Rest Slacker Double Hammock and couldn't be happier. This hammock spent the past summer outside in the elements and still looks brand new. Light weight yet durable, this hammock is great for camping or just lounging in your back yard. It easily folds up into a 1'x1' square for travel or just for winter storage.
customer_reviews.author: Belson524

customer_reviews.title: Best hammock I have ever used !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, high quality, made of ripstop polyester. Very little if any stretch. Looking forward to many great years of use "down by the river" :)
customer_reviews.author: older yogi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fun color. Can easily fit two people. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: The material was a bit thicker than some other hammocks I've had, but in the end was not as durable. The fabric failed after using for only 3 weeks, and dumped my 12 y.o. son on the ground... It's a risk you take with hammocks, but since he only weighs 120 lbs, it seems to me this hammock isn't all it's cracked up to be...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter, the hammock we received ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter, the hammock we received was a much darker color than pictured and did not have the mountain design. These characteristics were the main reason she chose this one over other.
customer_reviews.author: MT White House CEO

customer_reviews.title: Returning/holes!!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box this had signs of wear. Even a few small holes, im super disappointed with thia product. Definitely doesnt compare to other thermarest products :( not sure how to post a photo as soon as i do i will update this.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda E. Allworth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed so far.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a defect (hole in cloth). I have returned it (at my expense) and ordered another one. Will update this post later.
customer_reviews.author: chashans

product_meta.title: Therm-a-Rest Slacker Hammock
product_meta.description: Slack off in style and comfort with our single and double Therm-a-Rest Slacker Hammocks. 100-percent ripstop polyester hammock feels great next to skin and dries faster than nylon. The Slacker Hammock's one-piece design increases comfort and boosts durability. Stuffs into integrated pocket; sized to hold tablets and e-readers. Includes ultralight, 6061 aluminum carabiners for easy hanging. Slacker Hammock Single size is available in 7 colors, and Slacker Hammock Double size is available in 8 colors, including Poler's Fuzzy Camo. Maximum Recommended Load: 400 pounds. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Soft: 100-Percentage ripstop polyester adds comfort; dries faster than nylon
Seamless: one-piece design increases comfort and boosts durability with 400 lb. Capacity
Portable: Stuffs into integrated pocket; sized to hold tablets and e-readers
Easy: ultralight aluminum carabiners for easy hanging
Made in the USA of US and imported materials
